decisions.description: if checked, DCF Non Infra record will be linked to work order as well as service resource. If not, it won't link to work order but it will link to service resource only.

Flow.description: Created as part of SFS-3063 Updated as part of SFS-3976 Updated as part of SFS-5802 Updated as a part of SFS-6836 Updated as a part of SFS-6577 Updated as part of SFS-7520
Flow.interviewLabel: DCF Waste Water & Bio Chemical Acceptance {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: DCF Waste Water & Bio Chemical Acceptance

fields.name: Chemical_Acceptance_Form
fields.fieldText: If you are unable to accept this chemical delivery at any point in this form, please navigate back to this page to reject & give a reason. You will then be able to terminate the form.

screens.name: Display_File_Not_Uploaded_Message_Screen
screens.label: Display File Not Uploaded Message Screen

fields.name: UploadAtLeastOneFileScreen
fields.fieldText: You have skipped the file upload... Please make sure you upload at least one file.

fields.name: Fault_Message_Create
fields.fieldText: We have an Exception while trying to create DCF Non Infra record, please connect with Admin to resolve the issue: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Fault_Message_Update
fields.fieldText: We have an Exception while trying to update DCF Non Infra record, please connect with Admin to resolve the issue: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Fault_Message_Create
fields.fieldText: We have an Exception while trying to create DCF Non Infra record, please connect with Admin to resolve the issue: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: IfRejectDeliveryerrormessage
fields.fieldText: Please enter the comments for the Reject delivery

fields.name: Header1
fields.fieldText: Waste Water Chemical Acceptance and Authorisation to Discharge From Bulk Chemicals (Liquid & Powder)

fields.name: EnsurePPE1
fields.fieldText: Ensure both driver and STW delivery supervisor are both wearing appropriate PPE as detailed in the SOP/LOP for each specific chemical. COSHH data must be immediately available at delivery point.

fields.name: Confirms_correct_chemical_is_being_delivered
fields.fieldText: Confirms correct chemical is being delivered.

fields.name: Driver_know_how_to_obtain_first_aid
fields.fieldText: Driver know how to obtain first aid.

fields.name: Check_contents_of_emergency_spill_kits
fields.fieldText: Check contents of emergency spill kits.

fields.name: Check_operation_of_wash_down_hoses
fields.fieldText: Check operation of wash down hoses.

fields.name: Understand_how_STW_can_stop_delivery_in_an_emergency
fields.fieldText: Understand how STW can stop delivery in an emergency.

fields.name: Check_correct_storage_tank_is_being_used
fields.fieldText: Check correct storage tank is being used.

fields.name: Is_there_Enough_room_in_tank_to_accept_the_delivery
fields.fieldText: Is there Enough room in tank to accept the delivery.

fields.name: Ensure_all_valves_are_in_correct_positions
fields.fieldText: Ensure all valves are in correct positions.

fields.name: Check_tank_for_signs_of_damage_leaks
fields.fieldText: Check tank for signs of damage/leaks.

fields.name: Carry_out_a_lamp_test_on_the_panel
fields.fieldText: Carry out a lamp test on the panel.

fields.name: Check_the_tank_bund_is_empty
fields.fieldText: Check the tank bund is empty.

fields.name: Check_exclusion_area_and_warning_signs_erected
fields.fieldText: Check exclusion area and warning signs erected.

fields.name: Remove_locking_device_from_delivery_points
fields.fieldText: Remove locking device from delivery points.

fields.name: Visual_check_to_ensure_driver_has_correctly_connected_pipework
fields.fieldText: Visual check to ensure driver has correctly connected pipework.

fields.name: Confirm_with_driver_to_contact_the_STW_prior_to_disconnection
fields.fieldText: Confirm with driver to contact the STW prior to disconnection.

fields.name: Open_delivery_valve_on_STW_side
fields.fieldText: Open delivery valve on STW side.

fields.name: Driver_must_gravity_test_before_pressurizing
fields.fieldText: Driver must gravity test before pressurizing.

fields.name: STW_operator_to_withdraw_outside_exclusion_zone
fields.fieldText: STW operator to withdraw outside exclusion zone.

fields.name: PPE_WORN_DisplayText
fields.fieldText: When contacted by delivery driver, return to delivery areas to observe safe disconnection, fitting of blank flange & washdown of delivery area as required. FULL PPE MUST BE WORN WHEN INSIDE THE EXCLUSION ZONE.

validationRule.errorMessage: Telephone Number should be 11 digits and contains only numbers
Telephone Number should be 11 digits and contains only numbers

fields.name: TakePhoto_DisplayText
fields.fieldText: Take photograph of all delivery paperwork (Delivery Note, Chemical Conformity Paperwork) and email to Area Planning Assistant. Send paper copies to Planning Assistant for filing.
